snippet.title: [TAS] Coleco 2010: The Graphic Action Game by Darkman425 in 05:40.37
snippet.description:
This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/5612M
TAS originally published on 2023-10-05

2010: The Graphic Action Game is a 1984 ColecoVision puzzle game. It is based off the movie 2010: The Year We Made Contact, a sequel to the film 2001: A Space Odyssey.

In this game, you are an astronaut trying to repair the computer systems of the Discovery ship before it crashes into one of Jupiter's moons. The player must find paths to each parts of the Discovery that need repairs, while avoiding the malicious MMF sparks that try to hinder the repair process with their bizarrely aggressive behavior.

Darkman425 ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/Darkman425 ) is able to repair the Discovery system and avoid disaster in record time.
